sect3.title: Overview

row.entry: This module manages the output profile both for display and for output.

sect3.para: Profiles to be used is picked up from the users home directory ~/.config/darktable/color/out

sect3.title: Usage
sect3.para: You can set intent and profile for both display and output. You can go to "Input profile" to have details on the different available options.
Softproof is toggled on/off using "space",this function allows you to preview the image rendered using a printer profile to se how colors will end up on the final pring.
